pullrequest.title: send world name as argument  in sim commands

content.raw: Just a note about terminology. In the SRC context, each "world" contains 3 "tasks" which must be completed in a sequence. The `n` here actually corresponds to a world, not a task. It's a small detail, but it can become messy once we start sending competition stats from the simulator back to the browser.
content.html: Just a note about terminology. In the SRC context, each "world" contains 3 "tasks" which must be completed in a sequence. The n here actually corresponds to a world, not a task. It's a small detail, but it can become messy once we start sending competition stats from the simulator back to the browser.
